review: Dont go to her.We been there as my child as vomtings since two days as it is walking we were waiting for 1.5 hours, finally when our name was called she didn't even check my daughter for one min( in vomtings atleast they will check for tongue, stomach and eyes, she Didn't even touched my child) just wrote some antibiotics. She seems to b busy and asking nurse to stop the patients coming . This doctors should atleast understand we come all over to rainbow leaving behind 10 hospitals near house because of itz brand value* **** *** *** ** ** ******* ****** **** ****** ******* **** **** *** ** ** ********* ***  ***** ***** *** ***** ** ***** **** ****** ******* **** ******** ****** **** **** **** ******* ** *** **** **** ******** *** ***** ****** **** ***** After paying huge consultation and cab charges still we don't get enough treatment for you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
She saved my child’s life. My child was having continuous fever and every doctor just prescribed usual medication and sent us home. She was the one who said something different ... she looked at my child’s tummy and felt something wrong. Indeed it was first stage of cancer.  This early detection saved my child !!

God bless her with all the success and knowledge
